channel.title: Please help how do i make animated pics and post it on the server status
channel.description: I know this is the wrong section but I need help posting animated pics on my server. Here is a example [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/15qbsrr.gif[/img] How do I make it move please help me. I tried everything[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 14, 2009, 02:00:45 pm[/size][hr]pleaseeee help

item.title: Please help how do i make animated pics and post it on the server status
item.dc:creator: @Pray_for_plagues Pray for plagues
item.description:
@Pray_for_plagues wrote:

You have to download a program that can record your screen, then convert the part of the video you want to use to a .gif . I donâ€™t know of any programs off hand but hopefully that helps you.

Read full topic
